org.openimaj.audio.generation

Interface Oscillator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Oscillator.DummyOscillator, Oscillator.FrequencyModulatedOscillator, Oscillator.NoiseOscillator, Oscillator.SawOscillator, Oscillator.SineOscillator, Oscillator.SquareOscillator

    public interface Oscillator
    The oscillator implementations for the synthesiser.
    Author:
    David Dupplaw (dpd@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Oscillator.DummyOscillator
      Generates an empty sample chunk
      static class  Oscillator.FrequencyModulatedOscillator
      Frequency modulation of wave types.
      static class  Oscillator.NoiseOscillator
      White noise generator
      static class  Oscillator.SawOscillator
      Oscillator that produces saw waves.
      static class  Oscillator.SineOscillator
      Oscillator that produces pure sine waves.
      static class  Oscillator.SquareOscillator
      Oscillator that produces pure square waves.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Synthesizer.OscillatorOptions getOptions()
      Returns the options for the particular oscillator type.
      SampleChunk getSampleChunk(int length, double time, double freq, int gain, AudioFormat format) 

    • Method Detail

      • getSampleChunk

        SampleChunk getSampleChunk(int length,
                           double time,
                           double freq,
                           int gain,
                           AudioFormat format)
        Parameters:
        length - The length of the sample chunk to generate
        time - The time at which the sample chunk should start
        freq - The frequency of wave to generate
        gain - The gain of the wave to generate (0 <= gain <= MAX_INT)
        format - The format of the sample chunk
        Returns:
        The sample chunk

      • getOptions

        Synthesizer.OscillatorOptions getOptions()
        Returns the options for the particular oscillator type.
        Returns:
        The options object
